lines.text: Shhh. Money.
You've been in jail?
Sure, it's'a not so bad. You behave and they make you a trustee.
If I don't come back you'll know it's good news.
And if you do come back bring four bottles of poison.
Too soon, too soon, he died too soon.
An hour too soon.
Hello? Room Service. Bring up enough ice to cool a warm body.
Well, if you fellows don't mind, I'm going to wash up.
Yeah, go ahead. The rest of us are already washed up.

[Repeated line]
Jumping butterballs!
Gee, I-I-I don't know whether I can keep it up for two and a half hours.
It's all right. We'll help you.
I still think it's a terrible play, but it makes a wonderful rehearsal.
Hurry up, before they come back. And, groan, groan, stagger about and don't die too soon! You must take your time. And you mustn't die before 11 o'clock.
Don't you worry! I'll give you the best performance you ever saw in a hotel bedroom!
That's the spirit! Good luck, Davis. Drop dead!

[taking off layers of clothing]
Now I know how Gypsy Rose Lee feels.

[Seeing Harpo, taking his coat off, with no shirt under]
I see he comes prepared.
No, he doesn't believe in shirts!
Ah, he's an atheist!
Oh, but you see, I've left home for good. I've burned my bridges behind me.
I see. But, you could go back if you wanted to.
My mother seemed very happy when I left.
Only a mother's mask. At this moment, she may be sitting at the fireside, wringing her hands.
Oh, we have no fireside.
You have no fireside? How do you listen to the President's speeches?
Wait a minute, suppose one of us got sick?
That's the idea! They can't pull a sick man out, it's against the law.
Remember, I had kidney trouble at the Astor and gallstones at the Plaza.
Oh, those were the happy days!
Oh, couldn't I have a disease with my clothes on!
Might lead to a Hollywood contract.
Hollywood! Oh, gentlemen, you are singing music in my ears. I, but, if Mr. Wagner finds out?
Think of the other Russians who made good in the same way, Gregory Ratoff... Ginger Rogersvitz...
Gee, I don't know where I'm at. Mr. Gribble says I owe 600 dollars, downstairs they think I've got a tapeworm, and this man thinks I'm a lunatic!

[Disapprovingly]
Love! He talks just like one of the characters in his play.
I don't know. I like-a love.
I like it too; but, there's a time and place for everything.
I like it anytime.
Miller! How did that meal get here?
Eh, Dr. Glass ordered it for the patient.
Dr. Glass did nothing of the kind!
Say, I refuse to argue with a House Dick.
I'm not a Dick, I'm a Doctor. Doctor Glass.
